Reduce Example

Reduce Example

This example demonstrates how to use the reduce primitive to compute a sum-reduction on an input array.

Overview

The reduce primitive performs a parallel reduction operation on an array of values, producing a single output value. This example computes a sum-reduction on 224 i32 values.

Key Concepts

  • Binary Operation: Sum-reduction using BinOpAdd
  • Data Type: i32
  • Input Size: 16,777,216 elements

Live Demo

Open Live Example

</a>

Code Example

const datatype = "i32";
const binop = new BinOpAdd({ datatype });
const reducePrimitive = new DLDFScan({
  device,
  binop,
  type: "reduce"
});
